entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
